definition: an instance of intense argument (as in bargaining), wrangle (over a price, terms of an agreement, etc.)
details:
noun
- an instance of intense argument (as in bargaining)
= synonyms: haggling, wrangle, wrangling
verb
- wrangle (over a price, terms of an agreement, etc.)
= example: wrangle (over a price, terms of an agreement, etc.)
= synonyms: huckster, chaffer, higgle
